name: Milk Mountain
description:
Submission for the Brackey's Game Jam

HOW TO PLAY:

use wasd or arrow keys to move around

use space to jump

after you collect milk, press space again in middair to fart and propel yourself upwards.

THEME:

run around and collect milk. drinking your collected milk all at once (together) makes the effects of your lactose intolerance stronger.

CREDITS:

all code and art and  gameplay stuff was created by me (Anthony).

all music and sounds effects were created by the elite sound team (aka Westin Prichard, listen to more hot beats below)

https://soundcloud.com/user-205622310

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuVDuvL8vgzqd0p_81OKUdA

Westin wouldn't let me fart into his nice microphone, so the fart sounds came from https://www.zapsplat.com/

Also once again shoutout SpiderDave for the bricks https://opengameart.org/content/shiny-noise-bricks
